question:
Which among the following are the benefits under the Software Technology Parks (STPs) scheme?
a)Customs duty exemption
b) Accelerated depreciation
c) 100% FDI permitted through automatic route
Choose the correct option from the choices given below:
explanation:
The Software Technology Parks (STPs) scheme is launched under the Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology for export promotion. The STP of India was set up as an autonomous body in 1991. Some of the benefits offered are:
a) Customs duty exemption
b) Accelerated depreciation
c) 100% FDI permitted through automatic route.
